snippet: John Tomic, the father and coach of the young Australian tennis star Bernard Tomic, is accused of hitting Thomas Drouet, his son’s training partner.
abstract: John Tomic, father and coach of Australian tennis star Bernard Tomic, is accused of hitting his son's training partner Thomas Drouet; if Tomic is found guilty of assault, it could result in a prison term and an extended ban from the tennis tour.
lead_paragraph: John Tomic, the father and coach of the young Australian tennis star Bernard Tomic, is accused of hitting Thomas Drouet, his son’s training partner.

headline.seo: Tennis Player’s Father Charged With Assault on Son’s Training Partner
headline.main: Father Is Charged With Assaulting His Son’s Training Partner
headline.print_headline: Father Is Charged With Assaulting His Son’s Training Partner
